/** * Requests a new changelist from the Perforce server. * P4Change creates a new changelist in perforce. P4Change sets the property * ${p4.change} with the new changelist number. This should then be passed into * p4edit and p4submit. * * * @see P4Edit * @see P4Submit * * @ant.task category="scm" */
